pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data analysis and scientific plotting package. This is a clone of the popular Origin software available on another well known platform implemented in Qt with powerful 2D and 3D data plotting, ASCII import and powerful spreadsheet data manipulation using column logic. Curve fitting and other statistical tools are also available.
